Text: This is awesome, I've really been wanting to see this.  Thanks for the upload.

i love the part when they running out of the goldfield hotel after the flying brick
CREEPy

I've been waiting a long time for someone to upload this documentary in good quality. I had a 700mb version of it from years ago with the ending messed up a bit and that was all I could find. So a MASSIVE thank you for this. Awesome upload.

This is your typical American style over substance deal, lots of styleised cinematography and foreboding music but little to get your teeth into. Lots of background information of 'what people have said' and a voice over of opinion over fact. 

Had to laugh at his extensice THREE WEEK investigation into the paranormal lol

basically your spoon fed what your supposed to feel or think by thier own interpretation, this goes for the 'witness' statements too, which are themselves laughable.

Having said all this its free why am i complaining. If your spooked easy then you will no doubt jump at this and its a fun watch in its own way.

Just dont expect any serious investigation or credible information.

Great quality, sound is top notch.

Thanks for the upload.  This copy is way better than the last copy I got and it's a complete copy too. I too had the 700mb version with the messed up ending. How did you get this version? Anyways big thanks!! :)
